subject: Sexual Health
title: Partner Notification
description: A short lesson to help you apply Partner Notification.

hook.text: One positive test result can protect dozens of people if past partners are notified in time.

buildup.text: Partner notification means informing recent sexual contacts so they can get tested and treated.

discovery.text: Many health departments offer anonymous notification services so the source stays confidential.

twist.text: Without notification, untreated partners often reinfect the original person, creating a cycle.

climax.text: Breaking the chain of transmission requires courage, but it is one of the most impactful health acts.

punchline.text: One honest conversation can stop an epidemic.

quiz.question: Why is partner notification important?
options: It breaks the chain of transmission
